User Input: How do I create an account?
Response: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button and fill in the required details.

User Input: How do I log in?
Response: Click on the 'Login' button and enter your email and password.

User Input: I forgot my password.
Response: Click on the 'Forgot Password' link and follow the instructions to reset your password.

User Input: How can I search for jobs?
Response: You can search for jobs by entering keywords in the search bar and applying filters for location, job type, and more.

User Input: How do I apply for a job?
Response: To apply for a job, click on the job listing and then click on the 'Apply' button. Follow the instructions to submit your application.

User Input: Can I upload my resume?
Response: Yes, you can upload your resume by going to your profile and clicking on the 'Upload Resume' button.

User Input: How do I post a job?
Response: To post a job, log in to your employer account and click on the 'Post a Job' button. Fill in the job details and submit.

User Input: What details are required to post a job?
Response: You will need to provide the job title, description, requirements, location, and salary range.

User Input: How can I track my application status?
Response: You can track your application status by going to the 'Applications' section in your profile.

User Input: What is the application process?
Response: The application process involves searching for jobs, clicking on a job listing, and then applying by following the instructions.

User Input: Can I edit my job posting?
Response: Yes, you can edit your job posting by going to your employer dashboard and selecting the job you want to edit.

User Input: How do I delete my account?
Response: To delete your account, please contact our support team at support@jobdekho.com.

User Input: Is there a fee to post a job?
Response: Posting jobs is free for basic listings. For premium features, please check our pricing page.

User Input: How do I contact support?
Response: You can contact our support team by emailing support@jobdekho.com or calling our helpline at 123-456-7890.

User Input: What is the response time for support?
Response: Our support team typically responds within 24 hours.

User Input: How do I update my profile information?
Response: To update your profile information, go to your profile page and click on 'Edit Profile'.

User Input: Can I save job searches?
Response: Yes, you can save job searches by clicking on the 'Save Search' button after performing a job search.

User Input: How do I view my saved jobs?
Response: You can view your saved jobs by going to the 'Saved Jobs' section in your profile.

User Input: What is the difference between a job seeker and an employer account?
Response: A job seeker account allows you to search and apply for jobs, while an employer account allows you to post job listings and search for candidates.

User Input: How do I change my account type?
Response: To change your account type, please contact our support team at support@jobdekho.com.

User Input: Can I receive job alerts?
Response: Yes, you can set up job alerts by going to your profile and configuring your job alert preferences.

User Input: How do I apply for multiple jobs?
Response: You can apply for multiple jobs by visiting each job listing and submitting an application for each one.

User Input: Can I delete a job application?
Response: No, once an application is submitted, it cannot be deleted. However, you can withdraw your application by contacting the employer directly.

User Input: How do I edit my resume?
Response: To edit your resume, go to your profile, click on 'Edit Resume', make the necessary changes, and save.

User Input: What if I encounter an error while applying for a job?
Response: If you encounter an error, please contact our support team at support@jobdekho.com with the details of the issue.

User Input: How can I find remote jobs?
Response: You can find remote jobs by selecting the 'Remote' filter in the job search options.

User Input: Can I view the jobs I've applied for?
Response: Yes, you can view the jobs you've applied for by going to the 'Applications' section in your profile.

User Input: How do I change my password?
Response: To change your password, go to your profile settings, click on 'Change Password', and follow the instructions.

User Input: Are there any tips for creating a strong resume?
Response: Yes, our blog provides tips on creating a strong resume. Visit our blog section for more information.

User Input: How do I deactivate my account temporarily?
Response: To deactivate your account temporarily, please contact our support team at support@jobdekho.com.

User Input: What should I do if I find a fraudulent job posting?
Response: If you find a fraudulent job posting, please report it immediately using the 'Report' button on the job listing or contact our support team.

User Input: How can I follow up on my job application?
Response: You can follow up on your job application by sending a polite email to the employer, expressing your continued interest in the position.

User Input: Can I filter job listings by company?
Response: Yes, you can filter job listings by company using the search filters on the job search page.

User Input: What kind of jobs can I find on this portal?
Response: You can find a wide range of jobs, including full-time, part-time, internships, freelance, and remote positions across various industries.
